revisionDesc.change: updated TEI header to follow new encoding of respStmt within titlStmt; moved notes to external notes file and replaced with ptr encoding; removed empty opener elements
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Re-dated to October 1867 and proofreading notes.
Moved RMBucke to HandNote; fixed editor, date, and title; reviewed paragraphing
Replaced smart quotes with straight; removed external URL links.
Completed date note and oral proof corrections.
Replace straight quotes with smart quotes

body.p:
i got you letter to day wensdayWednesday with the money all safe and was glad to hear from you it seemed like an age since i had seen you i am glad you are better situated than you was i am about the same of my lameness but yesterday and to day today i feel better and not so weak and exausted exhausted like i did feel i have my bed out in the room and sleep better and my appetite is better sis has been quite sick so marthe had A doctor
she was quite bad for two or three days she was as yellow as gold the white of her eyes was very yellow she was in here the most of the time the doctor said it was her liver he gave her something that has helped her very much O walt dont don't you think you left two shirts and hankercheifhandkerchief
i went to the bureau to get something and there lay the shirts and handkercheif i did
feel real bad your new ones too how shall i get them to you i dont don't know if you will come christmas Christmas i will keep them then you needent needn't bring any well walt here we are yet the old folks is moving out and the son and wife is going to live in one room and bedroom and the other to be rented to another set rather too much of the good thing rather too many over head but winter aint ain't so bad as summer george says if you will buy
smithsSmith's half of that lot he will fix the shop for me he says he can put a cellar under it and turn it around for about 1200d twelve hundred dollars i would not mind its setting back from the street he says there is about 70 dollar worth of lumber there he wont won't take less than 900 doller dollars georg says property is high this fall write walt if you think well of it take care of yourself the carpenters carpenter's shop acrost across the street burned down last night
